23366581.review:
After a few letdowns from the latest offerings in the Artifex Mundi catalogue, Grim Legends 3 is a deeply triumphant return to their usual great form.

The puzzles, hidden object games, and thematic mechanics are varied and fresh for an AM game, with the defense mechanic being entirely new. The graphics and cut scenes are amazing, and the story, while part of their standard fare, is still engaging. Plus, some of the Steam achievements are challenging, and run into the bonus story, as well, which is also new.

It's good to see the developers that contribute to AM's catalogue improving their games! The Grim Legends line is probably my favourite of the catalogue, and The Dark City has quickly and definitively become my favourite. Definitely worth your time if you enjoy the HOG genre!

23363903.review:
知道恐怖传奇3要出了之后兴奋了好久，今天发售之后赶紧买来通关了，附加关卡的两个结局也都打了一遍。
这部游戏整体质量非常不错。游戏画面很精细很漂亮，虽然整体风格都非常黑暗，但也使得几个场景有了种特殊的美感，非常适合做壁纸。游戏音乐很好听，过场动画做的很好，但是数量很少。
这部的隐藏物体谜题中，图形隐藏谜题占了大部分，文字隐藏谜题较少，而且我没有在文字隐藏谜题中遇到任何的翻译错误。而附加关卡里找墨块的那个隐藏物体谜题借鉴了《黄昏：斯拉夫寓言》（我记得是这部）中的隐藏物体谜题，上来并不是直接找墨块，而是找一些盒子上的缺失部件，找齐后盒子打开，然后再从盒子中获得墨块。游戏中小游戏数量适中，难度适中，但是每次和人对打都要玩同一种并不算有趣的小游戏，让我感觉有些烦躁。这部也有收集系统，要在每张地图收集小玩偶，并不难找。
这部和《贤者之石》那部一样，可以选择“定制”难度，自定义提示冷却时间、可活动区域闪光等。游戏的主菜单画面是女主角站在屋顶，底下就是游戏序章开始的场地。点击开始游戏后直接就接女主角从屋顶跳下的动画，然后进入场地发生剧情，一气呵成。不过在主菜单的时候，底下的那个场地会跟着鼠标一起移动，我不知道为啥要这么设计，我只知道我鼠标一旦移快了就会非常晕……
[b] 最重要的是这部可以直接在口袋中对部分物品进行组合、拆分等操作，不用必须把物品放到指定地点后再组合或拆分。而且个别物品可以“翻看”，点击按钮就可以从其他角度看物品，从而可以对物品不同的面做不同的操作。[/b]
而且当你对一个地方使用物品时，如果是看起来非常可行但实际不可行的物品，比如说地缝里有块宝石够不到，正确操作是拿黏树枝子粘出来，但你认为拿腰带也能勾出来于是用了腰带，其他的游戏只会说“这不行”，最多再用文字给你说下腰带上的环勾不出来所以不行，但是这部不仅会用文字告诉你为啥不行，而且还专门做了使用了腰带却无法将宝石勾出的动画。业界良心啊！
但是这部恐怖传奇3，不知为何简化了一些东西。比如墙角有个木桶，点击放大调查，应当是木桶和它背景的墙角都放大了才对，但是这部放大调查后只有木桶放大了，他们并没有再画墙角的放大图。而且这种情况出现了好几次，不知道为什么没有单独画物品背景的放大图。而且这部也没有“笔记”了，只有“任务目标”了。倒是成就房间里有本书记录了游戏的剧情，不过这书加上对附加关卡的记录总共也只有9页，而且每页内容非常少而且潦草。不知道是不是因为这个快餐化的年代没人会好好把笔记都读完，所以干脆就不弄笔记了……
一般Artifex家的解谜游戏我都不会太评价游戏剧情的，因为解谜游戏的核心还是解谜，剧情一般很少而且也不会太有趣。但恐怖传奇系列会在进行主角故事的同时讲述另一个故事，比如1代的贵族小伙和农家姑娘的故事，以及2代的天鹅国王的故事。所以我一直对恐怖传奇系列的剧情报以很高的评价。这第三代是按章节进行的，虽然也在同时跟进两个故事，但是总感觉故事并不如前两代那样能给人留下很深的印象。我就不说这代讲了什么故事了，毕竟剧透不好。
最后再吐槽些不是很重要的……这部虽然场景名称和隐藏物体谜题翻译的没有问题，但是其他对场景的说明和提示什么的，全部都是机翻，翻的非常离谱。而主角他们组织一水的兜帽，外加称自己的前辈为“大师”，以及宣传视频中他们敏捷的攀爬建筑物外墙……他们真的没有刺客血统么？

23350811.review:
I've gotten to the point where I snap up every Artifex Mundi title the minute it comes out, and I'm rarely disappointed.  This new game is probably one of my favorites thus far.

The format is familiar to any veterans of the genre: minigames and hidden object scenes, inventory management, etc.  Where I feel it stands out is with some new features, especially an improved inventory that allows more interaction with objects, including combining and rotating objects.  Gone from this game is the mildly irritating "I guess I'll leave this hook here for the next half an hour since I don't have the rope to attach to it yet" situation; instead you're able to grab and combine as you go.  This cuts back on backtracking for earlier objects you couldn't use yet.

Graphically, this game is very pretty, especially for the genre which isn't always known for good-quality visuals (although that's improving with time).  Hidden object scenes are clear and crisp with no pixel hunting necessary.

Voice acting is done quite well in this game, which is a relief to me (and anyone like me who cringes at some of the godawful voicework out there).  I actually enjoyed listening to the dialogue for a change.

The minigames are varied and not too difficult, but aren't total pushovers either.  There are also the usual little flourishes, like achievements and collectables that add some extra fun (and replayability) to the game if you're a completionist.

Overall, a very good game with an interesting plot concept and well-crafted scenes and gameplay.  I clocked in at 3.5 hours for one playthrough, which is a good length for this type of game (even taking into account my stepping away from the PC for 20 minutes to make lunch).

Absolutely 100% recommended for any fans of the genre.  I generally wait for these games on sale because I don't usually like the $10 price, but I enjoyed this one so much I think I would happily pay full price.

40581758.review:
You can see real evolution in this puzzle series, by the 3rd game. I hope it continues the trend and gets even better!

The hidden object puzzles continue to be intensely challenging at times, with objects rotated, resized, and almost entirely obscured from view.

Pros:
- There are no glitches or technical problems at all. 
- The english version has no language problems, and has good voice acting.
- The art is absoloutely fantastic.
- There's a new customisation feature in the difficulty settings, so you can control individual aspects of the game such as enabling tutorial, dictating how long your hint button should take to recharge, and even deciding how "punishing" the penalty for misclicking in Hidden Object Puzzles will be!
- There was very little "collecting random objects before you know what you need them for" in this game. As a monster hunter diving into a troubled and panicked scene, every single thing you are able to pick up makes complete sense for the character to pick up.
- I think the puzzles in this game have hit the perfect balance between fun and challenging. The puzzles in this game remind me of the Monkey Island franchise (which is the highest praise I can think of for a puzzle game).
- There's a nice level of variation in achievements from game to game. While there are the usual "complete # chapter" and "complete on expert difficulty", there are still achievements which might take you by surprise. For instance, in the previous game there was an achievement for NOT using the tutorial... and in this game there is an achievement FOR using the tutorial. This took me by surprise and I've had to play it multiple times because of my initial assumption and impatience.

Cons:
- They removed the hidden object alternative game which they had in the first game. In this game your only option is to complete the hidden object scenes. Though they still have the hint button, so you shouldn't get too stuck on it, but it could still be frustrating for anyone who has extreme difficulty concentrating on busy scenes. (The first game allowed you to play a domino game instead, which was far less 'busy' to the eyes.)

Other: 
- Only in a video game do your pour 9 units of chemicals down a sink in order to get 3 units, rather than using the measuring lines!
- The storyline seemed a little bit flat to me, but that may just be because I don't personally connect to storylines about constant fighting.

39987663.review:
Good animations and story. Grim Legends is a good series to play. Had some references to the previous stories in forms of hidden objects. For the whole game there was only 1 object hidden so well, that I called i BS, but there was already a guide for it (and in game hints mechanic). The achievements were fun to complete.

A well made game to have in your collection.

39818786.review: Третья часть серии Grim Legends сменила сказочные декорации предыдущих игр на мрачный готический город, тайны которого стрережёт ассасино-тамплиерский орден. По сравнению с прошлыми частями именно классического поиска предметов (ковыряние в куче несвязанного барахла) стало меньше, увеличилось количество головоломок. По продолжительности, как мне показалось, игра получилась короче, плюс концовка оборвана и без прохождения дополнительной миссии выглядит не логичной. По графике все на уровне, кроме пляшущего лица Соломона, которое меняется между роликами и собственно игрой. Ну и традиционные ляпы локализации никуда не делись, как всегда на месте...

39694944.review:
A great adventure and different from the previous two games when it comes to the story and actions. You will be Sylvia who is a member of monster hunting order, there will be a theft incident which will start the whole adventure. The girl has lost her memory a year before that due to an accident you'll learn about as you progress in the game. I liked Sylvia's character design, personality and backstory. 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=928382318

The game has many hidden objects scenes, puzzles and mini games, along with a fighting scenes which you'll have to choose the right symbol to defeat the enemy. 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=928209047

Graphics are beautiful in this game, the location painted nicely, the lightning and colors looked so beautiful.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=928210066

Pros:
+Beautiful graphics and location.
+Very good cutscenes and animations.
+Interesting story which will keep you playing the game.
+Good music
+Good voice over.
+Fast travel map.
+Nice journal. 
+Solomon is cool!
+Collectibles.
+Steam achievements.

Cons:
-Some of the achievements are hard to get, especially the ones that require you to do something without a mistake from the first try.

Easily my favorite of all three Grim Legends games and I highly recommend it.

39638230.review: Третья часть, наделена своим шармом, своей необычайной историей, геймплей все тот же, головоломки такие же на уровне, история вышла очень уникальной и интересной, захватывающее приключение и спасибо за бонусную главу, которая поставила точку в этой истории, но увы, эта игра короче, чем две ее предшественницы. 8,5 слуг ордена из 10)
